General.Name: Lambodhara Textiles Limited
General.Description: Lambodhara Textiles Limited manufactures and sells synthetic yarns in India. It operates through Textile, Power Generation, and Real Estate segments. The company offers slub, multi count and multi twist, siro, and neppy yarns; generates electricity through wind mills and solar power plants; and engages in the rental of commercial complexes, as well as real estate development activities. It also exports its products. Lambodhara Textiles Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
